title: Security - Identify Phishing Attempt
description: A customer reports receiving a suspicious text message claiming to be from the company, asking for personal details.

tasks.description: Ask the customer for the content and sender of the text message.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the details of the suspicious message.

tasks.description: Compare the message content and sender number against a list of known phishing scams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the message is a known phishing attempt.

tasks.description: Advise the customer to delete the message, not to click any links, and report the number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear and accurate security advice.
